activities.name: üèõ Taipei 101
activities.description: Begin your Taipei adventure by visiting the iconic Taipei 101, once the world's tallest building. Ascend to the observatory for breathtaking panoramic views.

activities.name: üèõ Chiang Kai-shek Memorial Hall
activities.description: Immerse yourself in history at the Chiang Kai-shek Memorial Hall, a classic Taipei landmark with majestic architecture and the hourly changing of the guard ceremony.

activities.name: üåá Ximending
activities.description: Explore the vibrant and youthful Ximending district, filled with shops, street food, and entertainment, perfect for experiencing Taipei's modern culture.

itinerary.title: Culture and Cuisine
itinerary.subtitle: Artistic Wonders and Night Market Feasts

activities.name: üñº National Palace Museum
activities.description: Explore the vast collection of Chinese imperial artifacts at the National Palace Museum, showcasing centuries of history and art.

activities.name: üõç Shilin Night Market
activities.description: As evening falls, dive into the bustling atmosphere of Shilin Night Market, sampling a variety of delicious Taiwanese street food.

activities.name: üå≥ Yangmingshan National Park
activities.description: Escape the city and enjoy nature in Yangmingshan National Park, famous for its hot springs, sulfur deposits, and beautiful flower seasons.

itinerary.title: Day Trip to Jiufen & Shifen
itinerary.subtitle: Charming Old Streets and Sky Lanterns

activities.name: üèÆ Jiufen Old Street
activities.description: Take a day trip to the charming hillside village of Jiufen, known for its narrow alleyways, teahouses, and nostalgic atmosphere.

activities.name: ‚ú® Shifen Old Street
activities.description: Visit Shifen to release a sky lantern with your wishes written on it, a truly magical experience along the old railway tracks.

activities.name: üåä Shifen Waterfall
activities.description: Marvel at the 'Little Niagara of Taiwan', the widest waterfall in the country, located just a short walk from Shifen Old Street.
